metadata.description: Passionate junior software engineer currently living in France.I love the DevOps culture and building cloud native apps

about.catchPhrase: I am a software engineer passionate about cloud technologies, based in France.

experience1.description: In the same project as before at SII, I switched to a DevOps role to help the team migrate the application to a Kubernetes cluster.

mainTasks.task1: Developed CI/CD pipelines using Gitlab CI.
mainTasks.task2: Helped the team to make the application more cloud-native (stateless, scalable, resilient to failures, etc).
mainTasks.task3: Deployed the application on a Kubernetes cluster.
mainTasks.task4: The goals are to reduce the cost of the infrastructure and improve the quality of service for the users.

experience2.description: As part of a team of Kubernetes consultants, I helped a major client in Luxembourg (financial sector) to build a private cloud platform.

mainTasks.task1: Installed Openshift on different infrastructures (bare-metal, VMware, Nutanix).
mainTasks.task2: Configured Openshift to meet the client's requirements (LDAP integration, external storage and monitoring, security policies).
mainTasks.task3: Wrote a technical documentation to help the client start using the platform.

experience3.description: As a member of Agile scrum team, I contributed to the full-stack development of a web application used by thousands of users.

mainTasks.task1: Migrated a web front-end from Perl to Angular and developed new UI features.
mainTasks.task2: Maintained a large Perl backend (1,000,000+ lines of code, 15+ years of history) using a MVC architecture.
mainTasks.task3: Developed new back-end features using Typescript with Next.js

experience4.description: Full time internship. Work with my supervisor on a research project aiming to develop an app to protect workers' eyes.

mainTasks.task1: Developed an Android augmented reality application using Java and OpenGL ES.
